code: import React from"react";var ValidationSignup=function ValidationSignup(data){var errors={};if(!data.fname){errors.fname="First name is required.";}if(!data.lname){errors.lname="Last name is required.";}if(!data.email){errors.email="Email is required.";}else if(!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(data.email)){errors.email="Email is invalid.";}if(!data.phone){errors.phone="Phone NO is required.";}else if(data.phone.length!=10){errors.phone="Enter Valid Number";}if(!data.pass){errors.pass="Phone No is required.";}else if(data.pass.length<5){errors.pass="Password must be more than Four character ";}return errors;};export default ValidationSignup;
